properties.description: generally visitors are more elderly but all are welcome Coffee Pot is open to public offering refreshments (you can make a donation) and ofter some gentle activity but usually a chance to chat & relax. There is lunch (soup & Bread, sausage roll type) and in afternoon a chance to spread out and relax.
